get.description: Retrieves the security position details based on the security, portfolio and transaction reference

parameters.name: securityNumber
parameters.description: Security Numbers

parameters.name: securityAccount
parameters.description: Security Accounts

parameters.name: referenceNumber
parameters.description: Specifies the reference for the document, if any.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves the position information for the legal entities own book portfolios

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: portfolioId
parameters.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

parameters.name: depository
parameters.description: Person designated as depository by the company in or pursuant to this Indenture, and, unless otherwise provided with respect to any security, any successor to such person

parameters.name: subAccount
parameters.description: The sub-account that the security position is held in.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

subAssetType.description: The name of the Sub Asset Type

currency.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

parValue.description: Defines par value of the stock in the Security Currency

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

marketPrice.description: Current Market Price of the Security

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

depository.description: Person designated as depository by the company in or pursuant to this Indenture, and, unless otherwise provided with respect to any security, any successor to such person

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

subAccount.description: The sub-account that the security position is held in.

position.description: The final quantity of securities held

openOrderPosition.description: The number of securities related to the security position

unsettledCredits.description: The nominal of securities relating to this position that remains unreceived.

unsettledDebits.description: The nominal of securities relating to this position that remains undelivered.

blockedQuantity.description: The nominal quantity on a securities instrument that prevents it from being traded when the blocked quantity is exceeded.

valueInInstrumentCurrency.description: The amount converted to the currency of the instrument

valueInReferenceCurrency.description: The amount converted to the required reference currency

unrealizedMarkToMarket.description: The amount of unrealised profit and loss calculated as a result of mark to market revaluation

unrealizedMarkToMarketNet.description: The net mark to market gain or loss considering unrealised profits and losses

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

investmentProgram.description: The identifier of the investment strategy followed by the Portfolio
